content.p: Catch up with fellow Nottingham alumni based in DC at our casual get-together, hosted by our International Alumni Ambassador Robert Pinn. It's a great way to build your local network - and it's free, with appetisers and a drink included! The dress code is casual, you are also welcome to bring a guest with you - said guest does not also have to be a Nottingham graduate. For further detail contact our International Alumni Volunteering Manager, Hannah Norris. Mission Dupont, 1606 202th St NW, Washington, DC 20009. Ask for the University of Nottingham reservation Catch up with our series of events in India during October, as our Alumni Volunteering team hosted gatherings in Pune, Delhi, Mumbai and Bangalore. Hear from a panel of expert alumni as they delve into the rapidly growing world of financial technology and its impact on the global economy.
